mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ord_detail (ord_num, seq, item_num, id, item_name, price, item_comt, item_qty, item_price, ord_date, opt1, opt2, opt3, opt4, opt5, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id) VALUES (#{ord_num}, #{seq}, #{item_num}, #{id}, #{item_name}, #{price}, #{item_comt}, #{item_qty}, #{item_price}, now(), #{opt1}, #{opt2}, #{opt3}, #{opt4}, #{opt5}, now(), #{id}, now(), #{id});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ord_detail WHERE id = #{id} order by ord_num desc
mapper.update: UPDATE ord_detail SET item_num = #{item_num}, item_name = #{item_name}, price = #{price}, item_comt = #{item_comt}, item_qty = #{item_qty}, item_price = #{item_price}, ord_date = #{ord_date}, opt1 = #{opt1}, opt2 = #{opt2}, opt3 = #{opt3}, opt4 = #{opt4}, opt5 = #{opt5}, up_date = now(), up_id = #{up_id} WHERE ord_num = #{ord_num} AND seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ord_detail ORDER BY ord_num DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{pageSize}
